name: Climbant
description:
In this childish game, you have to jump on cubes, dodge incoming projectiles, and make sure you survive for as long as possible. You will use your two thumbs (if you have them) to move your heroes: sheeps, bulls, piglets and even a chicken. Tap left side of the screen to jump one square or right side to jump two squares.

* Addictive simple mechanics
* Really lovely characters
* Superb graphics
* Endless mode, unlockable characters
* One time only free of $1.99 to remove all ads if they annoy you
